Package gchess.boardgame

Class Board<T extends Piece>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gchess.boardgame.Board<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - This is the the piece type that is in our game.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChessBoard

    public abstract class Board<T extends Piece>
extends java.lang.Object

    Board

    This class helps implementing moves of pieces in a board game. Note: The board is not responsible for any move executions, it only saves data about the board state.
    Since:
    2018-04-23

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract Board<T> getCopy​()
      This function returns a copy of the board so that any modifications on the copy won't affect the current board.
      Move getLastMove​()
      This function returns the last executed move.
      T getPiece​(Position pos)
      This function returns the piece that seats in the position received as parameter.

      This function checks if a certain position is on the board.
      void movePiece​(Position source, Position destination)
      This function moves a piece from one position to another.
      void removePiece​(Position pos)
      This function removes the piece in the requested position by removing it from our hash-table.
      void setPiece​(Position pos, T piece)
      This function sets a desired piece in the desired location.

    • Method Detail

      • getPiece

        public T getPiece​(Position pos)
        This function returns the piece that seats in the position received as parameter.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the piece we want to get.
        Returns:
        The piece that was requested.

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece​(Position pos,
                     T piece)
        This function sets a desired piece in the desired location.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position we want the piece to be in.
        piece - The piece we want to put in this position.

      • removePiece

        public void removePiece​(Position pos)
        This function removes the piece in the requested position by removing it from our hash-table.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the piece we want to remove.

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece​(Position source,
                      Position destination)
        This function moves a piece from one position to another.
        Parameters:
        source - The current position of the piece.
        destination - The desired destination for the piece.

      • getLastMove

        public Move getLastMove​()
        This function returns the last executed move. This is for games were the last move is important.
        Returns:
        The last executed move.

      • isOnBoard

        public abstract boolean isOnBoard​(Position pos)
        This function checks if a certain position is on the board.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the position is on the board and false otherwise.

      • getCopy

        public abstract Board<T> getCopy​()
        This function returns a copy of the board so that any modifications on the copy won't affect the current board.
        Returns:
        A copy of the board.
